nodes.text: Death Troopers was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It depicted Han Solo, Chewbacca, and an unknown Twi'lek Jedi fighting off a horde of infected Imperials.
Death Troopers was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
